name: Gualtiero Marchesi
description: Gualtiero Marchesi was an Italian chef and restaurateur who was considered the founder of modern Italian cuisine. He was the first Italian chef to be awarded three Michelin stars.

name: Massimo Bottura
recipes: Oops! I Dropped the Lemon Tart
Tortellini with Cream of Parmigiano Reggiano
description: Massimo Bottura is an Italian chef and restaurateur who is the owner of Osteria Francescana, a three-Michelin-star restaurant in Modena, Italy. He is known for his innovative and playful approach to traditional Italian cuisine.

name: Gennaro Contaldo
description: Gennaro Contaldo is an Italian chef and restaurateur who is known for his traditional Italian cooking. He is a mentor to celebrity chef Jamie Oliver.

name: Lidia Bastianich
description: Lidia Bastianich is an Italian-American chef and restaurateur who is known for her expertise in Italian cuisine. She has authored several cookbooks and hosted several cooking shows.

name: Carlo Cracco
description: Carlo Cracco is an Italian chef and restaurateur who is known for his contemporary take on traditional Italian cuisine. He has worked at several Michelin-starred restaurants and has appeared on several cooking shows.
